glosses: not seen or experienced until the current moment, nonexistent

examples.text: Böyle giderse başına olmadık işler gelecek.
examples.translation: If things keep going this way, unexpected/unfortunate things will happen to you.
Don't come over unexpectedly/on an unexpected day.

examples.text: Ona olmadık sözler söyledi ve hızlıca uzaklaştı.
examples.translation: He said some inappropriate things to her and quickly walked away.

etymology: Compound of ol- (“to be”) + -ma (negative suffix) + -dık (realis participle suffix).
